verses.verse: In the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> began <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6645>Zibiah<s%> of <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

<S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all his <S%H3117>days<s%> in which <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> instructed <S%H3384>him.<s%>
However the high <S%H1116>places<s%> were not taken <S%H5493>away;<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> still <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

<S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> "All the <S%H3701>money<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> that is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in <S%H5674>current<s%> <S%H3701>money,<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H376>persons<s%> for whom <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> is <S%H3701>rated,<s%> and all the money that it <S%H5927>comes<s%> into any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it to <S%H376>them,<s%> every man from his <S%H4378>acquaintance;<s%> and they shall <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> wherever any <S%H919>breach<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found.<s%>"

But it was <S%H7969>so,<s%> that in the three and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had not <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and for the other <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2388>them,<s%> "Why don't you repair the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house?<s%> Now therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> no more <S%H3701>money<s%> from your <S%H4378>treasurers,<s%> but <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it for the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H225>consented<s%> that they should <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> more <S%H3701>money<s%> from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1115>neither<s%> <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H727>chest,<s%> and <S%H5344>bored<s%> a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in its <S%H1817>lid,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> as <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> therein all the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

It was <S%H7200>so,<s%> when they saw that there was <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in the <S%H727>chest,<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5608>scribe<s%> and the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and they put up in <S%H6696>bags<s%> and <S%H4487>counted<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H8505>weighed<s%> out into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of those who <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work,<s%> who had the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and they paid it <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> and the <S%H1129>builders,<s%> who <S%H6213>worked<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

and to the <S%H1443>masons<s%> and the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H2672>cutters,<s%> and for <S%H7069>buying<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>cut<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and for all that was laid <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> to repair <S%H2394>it.<s%>

But there were not <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5592>cups<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H4212>snuffers,<s%> <S%H4219>basins,<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets,<s%> any <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> or <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>
for they <S%H5414>gave<s%> that to those who did the <S%H4399>work,<s%> and <S%H2388>repaired<s%> therewith the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Moreover they <S%H2803>didn't<s%> demand an accounting from the <S%H582>men<s%> into whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to those who did the <S%H4399>work;<s%> for they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H530>faithfully.<s%>

The <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H817>trespass<s%> <S%H3701>offerings,<s%> and the money for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H935>offerings,<s%> was not brought into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> it was the <S%H3548>priests<s%>'.

Then <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H2371>it;<s%> and Hazael <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> that <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> and <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> had <S%H6942>dedicated,<s%> and his own holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> and all the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> it to <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria:<s%> and he went <S%H5927>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> and all that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>

His <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H7194>made<s%> a <S%H7195>conspiracy,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3101>Joash<s%> at the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> on the way that goes <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5538>Silla.<s%>

For <S%H3108>Jozacar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8100>Shimeath,<s%> and <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7763>Shomer,<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4191>him,<s%> and he died; and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
